Este juego permite simular diferentes situaciones típicas donde se pueden aplicar concpetos básicos de primeros auxilios. Estas situaciones son principalmente el atragantamiento, el dolor torácico y el encontrarnos con una persona inconsciente.
Stimulate
Now you have to start another maneuver to help the patient.
Do you need my help?
Patient
I'm in my high school.
Got it. Since the patient isn't breathing, you must try to use a defibrillator if there is one available.
A person
Alright. The first thing is avoid panic.
Please, try to be more specific.
You can't start the maneuver from this position...
Well, now you must change the patient's position and wait for the ambulance.
I already know that he isn't breathing
Is shouldn't press the button again!
Never do that!
The first thing you must do is trying to force the patient to cough.
I must call the ambulance right now!
Welcome to your voicemail, you have no new messages
Use
In the meantime, you should try to assist this person.
This is not going to help.
It seems I was unsuccessful in making the patient cough.
This is not the emergency number in Europe!
Continue...
The patient isn't breathing! We must do something urgently!
No, that isn't the way to put the patient.
Heimlich

My name is John and I'm here to help you.
